title: Sleep log
description: Each entry records daily sleep time.

in_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when person went to bed.

in_bed_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when person went to bed.

out_of_bed_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when person got up from bed.

out_of_bed_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when person got up from bed.

slept well.description: Commentary regarding how the person feels they slept on the specified date.
